name: JuJu Media
description:
JuJu Media provides quality custom-made software development and interactive marketing services.
Since April 2011, we have specialized in creating world class technology that is both beautiful to look at and user-friendly, backed up by the necessary infrastructure. We pride ourselves on our technical expertise and are passionate about finding game-changing solutions. Our clients range from start-ups to large enterprises, and we love to watch them prosper as they embrace new technology.
We are a global team with product studios in London, Atlanta, and Melbourne, plus engineering centers in Moscow and Kiev. This way we effectively develop, implement and support projects regardless of geography, time zone or language. And as our technical centers are in Eastern Europe, we can offer competitive prices without compromising on quality. Our business processes are fully coordinated to work with clients globally, and we are attuned to the needs of large businesses with sites worldwide.
